name: LearnLocal
signal_source: Educational access studies show students 'go to great lengths in search of stable Wi-Fi connection' with connectivity as major learning barrier
description: Community-based offline learning app that enables students to share downloaded educational content locally without internet
target_user: Students in low-connectivity areas who struggle with educational apps that require constant internet access
pain_point_evidence: Students report missing 'key portions of sessions due to technical glitches' with limited options for stable internet connections
core_loop: Download educational content in connected areas
Share content locally with nearby students
differentiation: Peer-to-peer offline sharing vs. centralized online delivery, builds learning communities around connectivity constraints
subscription_fit: Premium includes priority content access, advanced collaboration tools, and expanded storage

pricing.trial_strategy: Free basic content sharing, premium for advanced features and priority content
